Name: To Be Oranged
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest (discarded) & orange wedge on rim.
Review: To be arranged - In the meantime shake your tangerine with this pleasing earthy tequila and zesty fruity number.
History: Created in August 2015 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of To Be Oranged contains 141 calories
